title: Dynasty.Warriors.8.Xtreme.Legends-CODEX
description:
CODEX PRESENTS:
 
            Dynasty Warriors 8 Xtreme Legends Complete Edition

    Release Date :  5/2014                         Protection : Steam
    Discs        :  1                              Genre      : RPG


  'Dynasty Warriors 8: Xtreme Legends' introduces entirely new levels of fun
   to the refreshing gameplay vanquishing swarms of enemies with mighty
   warriors found in 'Dynasty Warriors 8.' In story mode, where you can
   immerse yourself in the vivid tales of the Romance of the Three Kingdoms,
   it is now possible to play as the mighty warrior 'Lu Bu,' and embark on a
   journey that depicts his way of life. Additionally, many new hypothetical
   scenarios to existing Romance of the Three Kingdoms battles have been
   added, as well as new playable characters, weapons types, growth/speedrun
   elements, and more! What's more, a revamped Ambition Mode and completely
   new Challenge Mode offer whole new ways to enjoy the 'Dynasty Warriors 8'
   universe.


   - Extract
   - Burn or mount the .iso
   - Run setup.exe and install
   - Copy crack from CODEX folder to your installdir
   - Play

   Block game exe in your firewall to prevent the game from trying to go
   online ..
